meanings.sent1: He was so niggardly that he never shared his snacks with anyone.
meanings.sent2: The niggardly man refused to donate even a small amount to charity.
meanings.sent3: The niggardly squirrel hoarded all the nuts for itself, leaving none for the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her niggardly attitude towards compliments made her friends feel unappreciated.
meanings.sent5: The niggardly landlord refused to fix the leaking roof, despite repeated requests.

meanings.sent1: The niggardly boss never acknowledged his employees' hard work.
meanings.sent2: Her niggardly behavior towards her guests was evident in the meager portions she served.
meanings.sent3: The niggardly magician only performed half of his usual tricks at the party.
meanings.sent4: The niggardly clouds held back their rain, teasing the thirsty crops below.
meanings.sent5: His niggardly compliments felt insincere and forced.

meanings.definition: Reluctant to spend or give; miserly
meanings.sent1: The niggardly old man refused to buy new clothes, even when his old ones were worn out.
meanings.sent2: She had a niggardly approach to sharing her time, always finding excuses to avoid helping others.
meanings.sent3: The niggardly chef only used the cheapest ingredients in his dishes, resulting in bland flavors.
meanings.sent4: His niggardly tips left the waitstaff feeling unappreciated and frustrated.
meanings.sent5: The niggardly millionaire refused to contribute to any community projects, despite his immense wealth.
